title: Your ads in game for pro league are always wrong.
body:
The ads that pop up in the game client for pro league are constantly wrong...

For example today, the client ad shows the games

DW vs CHF
SF vs IM
LGC vs AV
ABS vs SIN

when the games actually are

DW vs ABS
CHF vs SIN
LGC vs SF
IM vs AV

Surely it's not that hard, considering the time when these ads come up, to get the games right. Please place a little more focus on getting these little things right. Thank you.
